meanings.sent1: The extrachromosomal DNA was separate from the chromosomes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the extrachromosomal elements in the cell.
meanings.sent3: The extrachromosomal material decided to take a break from the chromosomes' party.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like extrachromosomal fragments, floating freely in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The extrachromosomal components were like rebellious guests at the chromosome gathering.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring outside of a chromosome.
meanings.sent1: The extrachromosomal genes were found in the cytoplasm.
meanings.sent2: Cells can contain extrachromosomal genetic material.
meanings.sent3: The extrachromosomal molecules enjoyed picnics outside the chromosomes.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like extrachromosomal entities, wandering beyond the usual boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The extrachromosomal structures danced freely outside the chromosomes, embracing their independence.
